In England, in the seven days to 09 June, there were 37,742 new confirmed cases (67.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 June, there were 22,966 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 64% (14,776 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 June is 3,988,008 (7,085.1 cases per 100,000 population).
